original_text: So Moses took his wife and his sons and had them ride on a donkey, and went back to the land of Egypt. And Moses took the staff of God in his hand.
korean_text: 모세가 그의 아내와 아들들을 나귀에 태우고 애굽으로 돌아가는데 모세가 하나님의 지팡이를 손에 잡았더라

sentences.original_text: So Moses took his wife and his sons
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 모세는 그의 아내와 아들을 데리고

sentences.original_text: and had them ride on a donkey
and went back to the land of Egypt.
And Moses took the staff of God in his hand.
